cards.header: Nokwiga gute ingene noganira inkuru yanje nubahirije ibigenga imirimo yanje hamwe nokugendera ubuntu?

cards.text:
## Muriki cirwa muraza kwiga:  
• Ingene ugendera ubuntu mugutanga inkuru zawe  
• Ingene wotangaza inkuru zihagaze kubibaho bihari atari iciyumviro  
• Ingene wotangaza inkuru zirimwo vyose kandi zega abakwunviriza

cards.header: Nokwiga gute ingene noganira inkuru yanje nubahirije ibigenga imirimo yanje hamwe nubuntu bwanje?

cards.text: Amashirahamwe y'ibimenyeshamakuru menshi yaramenyekanishije ingingo zirihamwe zijanye nivyakazi n'inyifato yise Ingingo z'inyifato kubakozi bayo. Rimwe na rimwe, imigwi y'abamenyeshamakuru canke amashirahawme y'abakozi bagira nkivyo. Umumenyeshamakuru yigenga atashirahamwe yegamiye ashobora kuba adafise ugufashwa nkuko gutomoye, ariko akwiriye kugumana urugezo (standards) ruri hejuru kuvya kazi canke mu nyifato yiwe. Naho woba wiyuvamwo cane kuvyerekeye inkuru kanaka canke agahohotero, iciyumviro cawe ntigikwiriye kuba inkuru yawe. Tanga inkuru uko ziri kandi ureke abagukurikirana bonyene bicire urubanza. Uzoba ubaye umumenyeshamakuru mwiza gusumba mu mpera.
# Amategeko 10 ngenderwako y'umwuga hamwe n'ubuntu bw'abamenyeshamakuru

## Bifise ibigaragara  
Ubumenyeshamakuru bwiza buhagaze kubintu bifise inshingiro bishizwe hamwe biciye mw'itangwa ry'amakuru ryiza, atari amajambo avugwa, ivyiyumviro canke ivyifuzo vyabantu. Naho woba wiyumvamwo inkuru cane gose, reka ibigaragara (faits) vyivugire vyonyene  kandi wizere yuko abagukurikirana bafise ububasha bwo kwikuriramwo ico batahura muriyo nkuru.

## Bishingiye k'umunyagihugu  
Nk'umumenyeshamakuru ujejwe gucungera inyugu yabanyagihugu utari umuvugizi wa politike canke wamashirahamwe y'ubutunzi. Ivyo utanga mu nkuru yawe bikwiriye kuba ata politik irimwo kandi vyerekeye ingorane zikomeye zijanye n'ubuzima bw'abanyagihugu basanzwe. Itangwa ry'inkuru yawe rikwiriye kuba ritomoye kandi ryoroshe gusoma.

## Kudahengama  
Abamenyeshamakuru beza barondera kuvuga ku mpande zose z'ikibazo atari gusa uruhande rufise ivyiyumviro bijanye nivyabo. Abamenyeshamakuru bakwiriye kubaza ibibazo abantu bukuri baserura ivyiyumviro bitandukanye ngirakamaro. Abatanga amakuru bakwiriye kuronka akaryo ko kwishura ababanegura hamwe n'ivyagirizo vyuko bakoze nabi. Ibi bishobora gusigura yuko uzoserukira abantu canke ivyiyumviro utashigikiye nagato. Ivyo vyose bigize ubumenyeshamakuru bwiza.

## Kutarenganya  
Ibwire ukuri kuvyerekeye ibijanye n'imico yawe, kandi ntubirekurire kuguhengamisha mugutanga inkuru kubandi. Irinde gukoresha ibishushane kubwoko, kuvy'amadini, kuvy'amamuko, ku gitsina , ku mwyaka, kuvyerekeye inyifato muvyi ibitsina (orientation sexuelle), akazi, ubushobozi bw'inguvu canke m'umutwe, kuvy'umubiri canke mu mibereho.

## Mukuri  
Ibigaragara hamwe n'ibigize inkuru bibwirizwa kwemezwa ko arivyo m'uburyo bwose bugushobokera. Ntukavuge inkuru wikuriye m'umutwe. Ntukahindure ivyagaragajwe kugira bishobore gufasha inkuru yawe canke ivyiyumviro vyawe. Ntukareke kuvuga ibintu nkenerwa kubera bidafasha inkuru yawe canke ivyiyumviro vyawe. Ntukahindagure ico umuntu yavuze canke ugikoreshe m'uburyo atakivuzemwo.

## Akamaro  
Umwuga wo kumenyesha amakuru ugomba kugirira akamaro kaboneka abayumviriza. Nimba inkuru zawe zidafise akamaro kagaragara kubuzima bw'abanyagihugu, ntibazosubira gusoma inkuru zawe. Nico kimwe rero no kuvuga inkuru yose canke kureka bishobora guhinduka ubumenyi bukomeye cokimwe nikiganiro nko ku kibazo nkenerwa c'abanyagihugu hamwe kumbure nihinduka rikomeye nko kutegeko ry'abanyagihugu.

## Mumwanya mwiza  
Igikorwa cawe gikwiriye gukurikiza umwanya mwiza. Itangwa ry'amakuru rikurikije umwanya mwiza rifitiye akamaro cane abagukurikirana m'ubuzima bwabo bwa minsi yose kandi bishobora noguhindura ivyerekeye amategeko aranga abanyagihugu. Ni bintu bikenewe cane yuko usohora inkuru ningoga. Amakuru acerewe ntamakuru aba arimwo nagato.

## Ishire wizane  
Abamenyeshamakuru ntibakwiriye kuba bafise icobasangiye n'umugambwe kanaka wa politik, imigambi, canke inyungu z'umugwi. Ntiwarukwiriye gutanga canke ntutange amakuru, kubera baguhemvye canke waronse ubushimwe bwishirahamwe canke bwabantu.  Wame minsi yose uzi neza ivyifuzo vy'abaguha inkuru utanga. Wirinde ibibazo bijanye n'inyungu zitahurijweko, zibazo canke arivyowibaza. Wirindi gukorana n'amashirahamwe canke kuja mu biganiro vyayo m'ubuzima bwawe bishobora kwonona ukwizerwa kwawe.

## Kumugaragaro (transparent)  
Abamenyeshamakuru bakeneye kuba bugurutse mu mutwe kuvyerekeye ubuhinga bakoresha mu kazi kabo, aho bakura inkuru, hamwe n'inyungu zijanye n'inkuru zabo. Erekana ibintu vyose bishobora gutera ibibazo bijanye nokudahuriza kunyungu. Ntufate inkuru ivuye mu irindi ishirahamwe ry'amakuru utaryitirira iryo ishirahamwe. Wemere amakosa ari canke ukudashobora bijanye n'itangwa ry'amakuru ryawe. Utomore ibintu bijanye nivyo wemereye abantu igihe wariko ubasaba inkuru. Wirinde uburyo bwo mu kinyegero mu kurondera inkuru kiretse ari hamwe ubundi buryo bwose bushizwe ahabona ata nakimwe butanze nk'inkuru ikomeye kubanyagihugu. Usabe yuko abanyagihugu bagira ico bavuze kutangwa ry'inkuru ryawe.

## Gabanya Amarira  
Ugomba kwitwararika burigihe ingene itangaza ry'inkuru yawe rishobora kugira ico rigize kubo vyerekeye. Itwararike rero nkibihe woba uriko urarondera canke ukoresha ama interview canke ibigizwe namasanamu yo mubwoko bwa video kurabo bose bakozweko ningorane ikomeye canke bagandaye, na cane cane mugihe vyoba vyerekeye abana canke abantu batamenyereye ivyukumenyesha amakuru. Abantu bigenga barafise uburenganzira bukomeye ku bwigenge bwabo kurusha abatware canke abandi bose barondera ingumvu canke kwimenyekanisha. Umwitwarariko urenze w'abanyagihugu niwe wonyene ushobora gusigura iyinjirwa ryose mubuzima bw'umuntu. Abantu bagirizwa ivyaha ariko bataracirirwa urubanza canke abagizi ba nabi ntibagomba gucirirwa urubanza n'ibimenyeshamakuru.

## IBINTU VYO KWIBUKA  
• Wirinde ugushaka gushiramwo ivyiyumviro vyawe mu nkuru iyo ibigaragara bitabishigikira.  
•Utange inkuru y'impande zose naho woba udahuza n'uruhande rumwe canke zose.  
• Ugerageze utange amakuru afise akamaro ubwonyene kubagukurikiranan (ta communauté).  
• Ishire wizane (libre) uko bishoboka kwose mu nkuru yawe.  
• Uvugishe ukuri (transparent) kuvyerekeye abaguha inkuru hamwe n'isano woba ufitaniye niyo nkuru.  
• Ntushire abantu mu ingorane biciye mu nkuru yawe.

cards.question: Nicahe mubikurikira arakarorero ko kugendera ubuntu bw'umwuga wo kumenyesha amakuru?

choices.text: Itangaza ryawe ry'amakuru rivugira cane umugambwe utavuga rumwe na Reta birakugaragaza neza kurusha intwaro yoba ihari mwico gihe, igaragazwa cane nukwonona amatungo ya Reta.
Mera nkuko woba uri umunywanyi w'umugambwe mw'ihuriro ryawo mugihe uhari ariko ugiye gutohoza inkuru nkumumenyesha makuru.
Gutangaza inkuru kubibazo biguhimbara ariko bitazanira akamaro kubakumviriza.

cards.question: Nivyo canke Sivyo: Nimba ikibanza uranguriramwo imirimo yawe kitoroshe  kuburyo bikubera intambamyi mukubahiriza amategeko ngenderwako yaho urangurira imirimo, NTANGORANE NIMWE ihari mukutubahiriza amategeko ngenderwako y'ubuntu.

Abamenyeshamakuru bashobora kumenyekana canke bakamenyekana nkabahinga bafise ivyiyumviro bikomeye. Izinguvu rero haraho zishobora gutuma akarangamutima kimirimo yabo kononekara. Mukwirinda ibintu nkibi rero, abamenyeshamakuru bamenyekanye bagomba

choices.text: Tomora neza ivyerekeye amamuko y'imirimo yabo.
Haranira kugabanya ukugaragara kw'imigenderanire ikomeye hamwe nubutegetsi bwa poritike bwo hejuru hamwe n'abarwizatunga.
Emeza kandi umwitwarariko wabo w'ugutangaza inkuru kunyungu yanyagihugu atari abantu barongoye abandi bari mw'iryo tangaza ryose.
